#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define gc getchar
#define geti(x) scanf(" %d", &x)
#define getll(x) scanf(" %lld", &x)
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

using namespace std;

int ans(int n,int r){
    if(n<r) return 0;
    if(n==r || r==0) return 1;
    return ans(n-1,r)+ans(n-1,r-1);
}

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    geti(t);
    while(t--){
        geti(n);
        cout << 10*n*n*n - 6*n*n << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
